column72: In the last 12 months, did your organization make progress toward achieving gender representation targets?
column73: Leadership Demographics: Before we move to the next section, is there anything else you want to tell us about how your organization tracks, reports on or seeks to change its leadership demographics?
column74: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Is  your product or service designed specifically to address gender needs in a way that competing products or services are not?
column75: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: What % of your products or services sold have a gender focus?
column76: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: In the design of your products or services, has your organization explicitly tested how products or services are used by different genders and designed and tested products with the needs of those different users in mind?
column77: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Does your workplace have policies in place to ensure gender bias is eliminated from marketing materials?
column78: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Does the organization have a written policy that suppliers are expected to meet regarding gender equity and diversity standards?
column79: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Is there a policy to review potential suppliers to confirm alignment with your organization's position on gender equity and diversity?
column80: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Does the organization review and discuss compliance with its gender equity policy prior to signing a contract with a supplier?
column81: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: What % of procurement is sourced from women-owned and gender-diverse led businesses?
column82: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Does the organization have a written policy regarding gender equity that specifies the gender-related benefits and practices that a contractor or subcontractor must comply with?
column83: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Does the organization review and discuss compliance with its gender equity policy prior to signing a contract with a potential contractor or subcontractor?
column84: Customers, Contractors & Suppliers: Before we move to the next section, is there anything else you want to tell us about how your organization aligns its gender equity and diversity goals with customers, contractors and suppliers?
column85: Legal Compliance: Does your organization have a written non-discrimination or equal employment opportunity policy that  applies to all employees globally and which specifically references "race", "ethnicity", "religion", "socio-economic status", "sexual orientation" and "gender identity" that is distributed to employees through a handbook or other publicly-available place and included in all job descriptions?
column86: Legal Compliance: Does your organization have any litigation pending regarding discrimination or EEOC claims?
column87: Legal Compliance: If there is current discrimination or EEOC litigation pending, please provide details.
column88: Legal Compliance: Does your organization have any litigation regarding harassment claims?
column89: Legal Compliance: If there is current discrimination or EEOC litigation pending, please provide details.
column90: Legal Compliance: Over the last 5 years, how much has the organization paid in settlements on discrimination or harassment suits?
column91: Legal Compliance: Describe how and with what frequency your organization ensures compliance with all federal, state and local EEOC mandates.
column92: Legal Compliance: Do employees have a collective bargaining agreement?
column93: Legal Compliance: Has your organization eliminated the use of non-disclosure agreements in settling harassment or discrimination claims?
column94: Legal Compliance: Has your organization eliminated forced mediation requirements from all employee contracts and agreements?
